name: Natural Leader
description: Provides stability to the crew during stressful situations.

name: Stoic
description: Remains emotionally stable regardless of circumstances.

name: Risk Taker
description: Willing to take chances for better outcomes.

name: Cautious
description: Prefers safe approaches, reducing accidents but slowing progress.

name: Optimist
description: Sees the bright side, gaining extra morale from positive events.

name: Pessimist
description: Always expects the worst. Less affected by negative events.

name: Loner
description: Prefers solitude. Less affected by social events.

name: Caretaker
description: Dedicated to crew wellbeing. Enhanced medical effectiveness.

name: Homesick
description: Misses Earth deeply. Boosted by Earth contact, hurt by isolation.

name: Endlessly Curious
description: Thrives on discovery. Major morale boost from findings.
